thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zagg Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.71 Excluding Items

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zagg Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.71 Excluding Items
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Zagg Inc:
* ZAGG REPORTS RECORD 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 SALES $550 MILLION TO $570 MILLION * QTRLY ‍NET SALES OF $176.9 MILLION, A 54% INCREASE COMPARED TO $114.9 MILLION​
* ‍FOR FULL YEAR 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS GROSS PROFIT MARGIN AS A PERCENTAGE OF NET SALES IN LOW TO MID 30’S RANGE​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.73, REVENUE VIEW $167.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.36 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
